org.gstreamer.elements

Class ByteDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gstreamer.lowlevel.NativeValue
      • org.gstreamer.lowlevel.Handle
        • org.gstreamer.lowlevel.NativeObject
          • org.gstreamer.lowlevel.RefCountedObject
            • org.gstreamer.GObject
              • org.gstreamer.GstObject
                • org.gstreamer.Element
                  • org.gstreamer.Bin
                    • org.gstreamer.elements.ByteDataSink

  • public class ByteDataSink
extends Bin
    Class that allows to pull out buffers from the GStreamer pipeline into the application, using an appsink. The buffers are NOT converted into 32bit RGB.

    • Method Detail

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener()
        Sets the listener to null. This should be used when disposing the parent object that contains the listener method, to make sure that no dangling references remain to the parent.

      • setPassDirectBuffer

        public void setPassDirectBuffer(boolean passThru)
        Indicate whether the RGBDataSink should pass the native IntBuffer to the listener, or should copy it to a heap buffer. The default is to pass a heap IntBuffer copy of the data
        Parameters:
        passThru - If true, pass through the native IntBuffer instead of copying it to a heap IntBuffer.

      • getSinkElement

        public BaseSink getSinkElement()
        Gets the actual gstreamer sink element.
        Returns:
        a BaseSink
